```{r}

#Introduce new column "dosage" that contains low and high based on amount of drug used
prostate_data_augment<-prostate_data_clean|>
  mutate(`Dosage`=case_when(
  0<=`Treatment regime` & `Treatment regime`<=0.2 ~ "Low",
  1<=`Treatment regime` & `Treatment regime`<=5 ~ "High"
  ))

prostate_data_augment<-prostate_data_clean|>
  mutate(`Risk`=case_when(
  0<=`sg` & `sg`<=5 ~ "Low",
  5<`sg` & `sg`<=10 ~ "High",
  10<`sg` & `sg`<=15 ~ "Very high",
  ))
```


```{r}
#|label: Save data

output_file_path <- "../data/02_dat_aug.tsv"
write_delim( prostate_data_augment, file = output_file_path )
```
